title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Docs
description: App README/run/build/ingest, API docs, data model/enums/provenance, ingestion/backfill guide, ops/runbook.
close_reason: Comprehensive documentation complete: expanded README with overview, features, structure, quick start, data model, API reference, ingestion guide, development workflow, deployment, testing strategy, performance targets, and contributing guidelines.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Frontend
description: Vite/React/MUI + Leaflet UI: map clusters, tooltips, filters (date range, airport/region, category, search), table sorted date desc, detail modal, state mgmt, accessibility.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Data Sources
description: Adapters for ASN/AVHerald, UTC normalization, status/severity mapping, GA/Commercial heuristic, dedupe/merge (date_z, reg + fuzzy), provenance append, recent-window crawl, manual trigger, retries/logging.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Database
description: Schema/migrations for events+sources, indexes, >=2000 constraint, upsert by (date_z, registration), repo layer.
close_reason: Database schema complete: schema.sql with events+sources tables, >=2000 constraint, indexes (date_z, reg+date, geo, airport, category). Repository layer with upsert by (date_z, registration), list/filter, detail with sources, snake_case->camelCase conversion.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Tests
description: Unit (parsers/classifiers/dedupe/time), integration (API+ingestion), contract fixtures for adapters, frontend component tests, smoke/E2E map/filters/table, perf guardrails.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: API
description: REST API for events (list/filter/paginate), detail with sources, guarded ingest trigger, health/version, response shaping for map vs table, OpenAPI.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Planning
description: Scope/MVP, non-goals, sources, data model uniqueness (date_z, registration), GA/Commercial heuristic, UTC normalization, retention >=2000, perf targets, security.
close_reason: Planning complete: PLAN.md defines scope/MVP, non-goals, stack (Node/TS + React + Leaflet), sources (ASN/AVHerald), data model (date_z, registration uniqueness), provenance, GA/Commercial heuristic, UTC normalization, >=2000 retention, perf targets, security. beads.yaml maps epics/stories.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Geo
description: Airport lookup (ICAO/IATA->lat/lon/country/region), reverse geo fallback, map tile/cluster prep, cache layer.

title: Aviation Accident Tracker: Backend Service
description: Node/TS service scaffold, config/logging/error model, ingestion orchestrator, classification helper, pagination/filter helpers, health/version endpoints.
